Patient 35: Patient 35 is a 14-year-old girl with a history of asthma and allergic rhinitis. She uses an albuterol inhaler as needed and takes montelukast daily for allergy management. Her family history includes asthma in her mother and seasonal allergies in her father. She has a known allergy to peanuts, which requires vigilance in her dietary choices. Her medication regimen has been stable, with no recent changes or adjustments.
